wikipedia_page.main: Alison Jane Brittain  (née Hopkins; born February 1965) is a British businesswoman, the chief executive officer (CEO) of Whitbread. She was formerly head of retail banking at Lloyds Banking Group.

response: * Alison Brittain, CEO of Whitbread, Former head of Lloyds Banking Group
*February – Alison Brittain, née Hopkins, business executive
Harrison became CEO of the British multinational hotel, coffee shop and restaurant company Whitbread in 2010, replacing Alan Parker. Harrison left in 2015, succeeded by Alison Brittain.
